incident_updates.body: As part of our continuous improvement plan, we will be carrying out a maintenance on our cooling infrastructure. scheduled_maintenances.name: [CCH01][Infrastructure] - Electrical background work in multiple racks

incident_updates.body: As part of our continuous improvement plan, a maintenance is scheduled on our electrical infrastructure. Start time : 01/07/2025 06:00 UTC End time : 01/07/2025 16:00 UTC Service impact : Some servers in the following racks: CCH0101E01A, CCH0101E01B, CCH0101E01C, CCH0101E02A, CCH0101E02B, CCH0101E02C, CCH0101E03A, CCH0101E03B, CCH0101E03C, CCH0101E04A, CCH0101E04B, CCH0101E04C, CCH0101D01A, CCH0101D01B, CCH0101D01C, CCH0101D02A, CCH0101D02B, CCH0101D02C, CCH0101D03A, CCH0101D03B, CCH0101D03C, CCH0101D04A, CCH0101D04B and CCH0101D04C might be unavailable during the maintenance.
